body.pre: A model of the MAP-Kinase signalling pathway. The most enzyme reactions are assumed to follow a reversible Michaelis-Menten kinetic. However the "total enzyme concentration is not constant. Therefore for each reaction a forward and reverse direction is defined.

The activation of Sos is mainly due to the localication of Sos to the membrane.
There is an allosteric activation of Ras.
Jun, J. Regulation of Ras Exchange Factors and Cellular Localization of Ras Activation by Lipid Messengers in T Cells, Front Immunol. 2013; 4: 239.
Boriack-Sjodin, P. Ann et al. ; The structural basis of the activation of Ras by Sos, Nature 394, 337-343 (23 July 1998)
